My Work

ToDo_App
Demo Github

HTML5 CSS3 JS Tailwind CSS

This app helps you to create your own plans and tasks for everyday life, it is built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to add tasks , delete , filter a task as completed or still pending, edit , complete and search for one.

Sign System
Demo Github

HTML5 CSS3 JS

A simple sign up system with user authentication built with HTML5, CSS3 and Java Script , by consediration that signup with a different email that can never used before. secure your page with unautorized users when signed in.
